timeline.activity: Clinical examination competency testing of the students

notes.discussion: General Medicine requires skills and competency to capture clinical data from a given patient in the form of the patient's past and present life events in the form of a history timeline followed by further data collection from the body in the form of general survey points as well as different organ system review in the form of local examination in the patient's body

Viva/oral examination shall assess: Approach to patient management, Emergencies, Attitudinal, Ethical and Professional values. Candidateâ€™s skill in interpretation of common investigative data, X-rays, identification of specimens, ECG, etc. is to be also assessed.
